You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesO O] > &ocy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ocy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/041e/index.htm U+0041E].
  * `&ocy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/043e/index.htm U+0043E].
